title: Windows 7 SP1 IE11 + 18in1 Activated v3 (AIO)(x86-x64) - AppzDam
description:
This assembly is the legal successor build of Windows 7 SP1 IE11 + RUS-ENG x86-x64 -18in1- Activated v2 (AIO). It is distinguished from its predecessor is that the current assembly includes an update as at 25 April 2015. Also, it is more resistant to update the core system activator. Well, rest on a trifle ... Efficiency build as much as possible carefully checked. After installation you get a fully registered and activated Windows 7 operating system chosen wording.

The composition of the assembly :

Thus, this assembly includes 9 9 Russian editions and English editions of Windows 7 SP1 32-bit (x86) and 64-bit (x64) core: - Windows 7 Starter SP1 Russian - Windows 7 Starter SP1 English - Windows 7 Home Basic SP1 x86 Russian - Windows 7 Home Basic SP1 x86 English - Windows 7 Home Basic SP1 x64 Russian - Windows 7 Home Basic SP1 x64 English - Windows 7 Home Premium SP1 x86 Russian - Windows 7 Home Premium SP1 x86 English - Windows 7 Home Premium SP1 x64 Russian - Windows 7 Home Premium SP1 x64 English - Windows 7 Professional SP1 x86 Russian - Windows 7 Professional SP1 x86 English - Windows 7 Professional SP1 x64 Russian - Windows 7 Professional SP1 x64 English - Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x86 Russian - Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x86 English - Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x64 Russian - Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x64 English

Features :

- At an early stage there is a pre-boot setup menu where you can select the digit of the primary shell, that is, the installer will use a 32-bit or 64-bit. - The original installer Windows 7 is replaced by the slightly revised from the Windows Installer 8.1. - The assembly Integrate all the critical updates that are available as of April 25, 2015, including Internet Explorer 11. - Instead of embedded by default with updates Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile is integrated into the assembly lightweight version of .NET Framework 4.5.2 (Project Slim Microsoft. NET Framework 4.5.2 Full x86 / x64). - In the assembly of integrated Microsoft Visual C ++ 2005, 2008, 2010, 2012 and 2013 Redistributable Package latest versions. To avoid duplicate installations different applications earlier and refocus the program you want these packages on the latest versions of the libraries, the installation is blocked outdated versions of plugs (project [addon] Microsoft Visual C ++ Redistributable Package 2005-2008-2010-2012-2013 Hybrid). - In It integrated package of DirectX 9. - In the System Restore service that runs from the installation media, an integrated module of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) version 8.1, and recovery service that is built into the system - MSDaRT version 7.0, which greatly expands the possibilities of intensive care system. - For technical reasons, from the System Restore, launched from the installation media is excluded item "System Restore" allows you to roll back the system to the previously established reference points. - In the System Restore service, how to run from the installation media, and the built-in the system itself is integrated AntiSMS version 7.4.3 software for the rapid treatment of auto-blockers and Trojans. - If during the installation you entered a valid license key in the appropriate field, then the system will be activated with this key to a completely legitimate. If the field is left blank, it will be used alternative methods of activation. - If you are installing on a computer that has in BIOS SLIC-table version 2.1 and above, will involve the standard legal (almost) the means of activation, developed by Microsoft for these computers . - If you have no license key and no SLIC-table in the BIOS, the system will use the built-in assembly activator. - If you choose to install Windows 7 Ultimate (maximum), the installation is complete you will be able to switch the interface language to Russian to English and back standard means Windows 7 Ultimate (maximum). If you have installed any other editor, you can use for this purpose tool Vistalizator version 2.5.1, the label is available in "Start" menu. - For technical reasons, no system with this assembly can not be updated for Windows Vista / 7. However, if you must install out of the existing system it is able to initiate a so-called Custom. When you run the installation from the already running 32-bit operating system, it's simple. But to initiate the installation of a 64-bit OS, you need to start it than through setup.exe at the root of the distribution media, and through setup.exe, which is located in the Sources folder distribution. Avtoran installation media when you run out of available operating systems, select the correct type of launch itself. If the existing system is in EFI / UEFI, then run out of it, and it is impossible to install a custom installation mode.

Differences from the assembly of Windows 7 SP1 IE11 + RUS-ENG x86-x64 -18in1- Activated v2 (AIO) :

- Previously used to assemble a redesigned installer from Windows 8 is replaced by the same Windows Installer 8.1. - are involved in the service recovery system, launched from the installation media, MSDaRT updated to version 8.1. - In the assembly of integrated all the critical updates that are available as of April 25, 2015. - Instead of Embedded me before package Slim Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.3 Preview x86 / x64, to build integrated Slim Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2 Full x86 / x64. Version 4.5.3 incorrectly work with some programs. - Integrated me earlier in the assembly package [addon] Microsoft Visual C ++ 2005-2008-2010-2012-2013 Redistributable Package Hybrid) is replaced by the new. - In the 64-bit version of System Restore, How to run from the installation media, and built into the system, integrated program AntiSMS version 7.4.3 for fast automatic treatment of blockers and Trojans. - In the 32-bit version of System Restore built into the system itself, integrated program AntiSMS version 7.4.3 for fast automatic treatment of blockers and Trojans. - The 32-bit version of System Restore, launched from the installation media, previously updated to an integrated program to version 7.4.3 AntiSMS. - Activator significantly improved with the help of the project WinKernel version 1.2. Now, in principle, must not be afraid to update the kernel. - Fixed a problem with the installation of OS mode EFI / UEFI with DVD-drive, both real and virtual. - Folder Support with service tools removed from the root drive distribution in order to save space. - Other minor changes.

System requirements :

32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor with 1 GHz. * 1 GB of RAM. * Support for DirectX 9 interface with the driver WDDM, at least 128 MB of graphics memory, Pixel Shader 2.0 in color and 32 bits / pixel. * Hard disk capacity of 40 GB to 16 GB of free disk space. * The drive for DVD-ROM drive. * Audio output capability. * Internet access
